doc.title: Your Thrift Habits
doc.plot: Jack is jealous of the new camera his friend Ralph has just bought. Jack knows that because of his irresponsible spending habits, he'll never have the kinds of things that Ralph, who is thrifty and sensible, will have. Jack resolves to change his spendthrift ways and cut down on extravagances like candy and movies in order to buy the things he wants.
